solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--    public ListNode rotateRight(ListNode head, int n) {--newline--        if (head==null||head.next==null) return head;--newline--        ListNode dummy=new ListNode(0);--newline--        dummy.next=head;--newline--        ListNode fast=dummy,slow=dummy;--newline--    --newline--        int i;--newline--        for (i=0;fast.next!=null;i++)//Get the total length --newline--            fast=fast.next;--newline--        --newline--        for (int j=i-n%i;j>0;j--) //Get the i-n%i th node--newline--            slow=slow.next;--newline--        --newline--        fast.next=dummy.next; //Do the rotation--newline--        dummy.next=slow.next;--newline--        slow.next=null;--newline--        --newline--        return dummy.next;--newline--    }--newline--}
